description: Unique identifier for the statement record.
Account number involved in the transaction.
Branch where the transaction occurred.
Customer identifier associated with the transaction.
Transaction code indicating the type of transaction (e.g., deposit, withdrawal).
Unique transaction reference number.
Description or details of the transaction.
Date the transaction was processed.
Value date of the transaction (the date the funds are effectively available).
Currency of the transaction.
Transaction amount.
Transaction amount in local currency.
Exchange rate used for currency conversion (if applicable).
Internal reference number for the transaction.
Identifier of the system that processed the transaction.
Indicates if the transaction was overridden (e.g., by a supervisor).
User who initiated the transaction.
Date and time the transaction was initiated.
User who authorized the transaction.
Date and time the transaction was authorized.
Branch of the user who performed the transaction.
